mdRecord.dcterms:title: Battle of New Orleans for freedom, September 14, 1874 / compiled by T.S. Hardee, C.E.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Hardee, T. S.
Lewis, Henry, 1819-1904
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Lith. & Pub. by H. Lewis, 22 St. Charles St.
mdRecord.dcterms:extent: 33 x 59 cm. on sheet 48 x 64 cm. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Map of the events that occurred in an attempt to overthrow the Reconstruction government of William Pitt Kellogg; sometimes known as the Battle of Liberty Place.
Text includes "History of the Revolution" and a "Roll of Honor" of citizens killed and wounded.
Imperfect: Separated into 2 pieces along old vertical fold line; small section of text missing at bottom of first column.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Kellogg, William Pitt, 1830-1918
